Module io.inverno.mod.web
Package io.inverno.mod.web

Class ContinueInterceptor

java.lang.Object
io.inverno.mod.web.ContinueInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExchangeInterceptor<ExchangeContext,WebExchange<ExchangeContext>>, WebExchangeInterceptor<ExchangeContext>
public class ContinueInterceptor extends Object implements WebExchangeInterceptor<ExchangeContext>

A web exchange interceptor that sends an interim 100 Continue response to the client on requests that contain expect: 100-continue HTTP header as defined by RFC 7231 Section 5.1.1.

Since:
1.3
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn

    • intercept

      public Mono<? extends WebExchange<ExchangeContext>> intercept(WebExchange<ExchangeContext> exchange)
      Description copied from interface: ExchangeInterceptor

      Intercepts the exchange before the exchange handler is invoked.

      Specified by:
      intercept in interface ExchangeInterceptor<ExchangeContext,WebExchange<ExchangeContext>>
      Parameters:
      exchange - the server exchange to handle
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the exchange or an instrumented exchange to continue the exchange handling chain or an empty Mono to stop the exchange handling chain
